explains: n. 仪式，典礼；礼节，礼仪，客套
wordGroup: opening ceremony 开学典礼；开幕式；开幕仪式；开幕典礼
wedding ceremony n. 结婚典礼
signing ceremony 签字仪式；签约仪式
graduation ceremony n. 毕业典礼
award ceremony 颁奖仪式，颁奖典礼
marriage ceremony 结婚仪式，结婚典礼
launching ceremony 下水仪式；下水典礼
stand on ceremony 讲究客套；拘于礼节
foundation stone laying ceremony 奠基仪式；奠基礼
completion ceremony 竣工式，竣工仪式

sentences.en: I hate all this pomp and ceremony.
sentences.cn: 我讨厌所有这些排场和仪式。

sentences.en: He left halfway through the ceremony.
sentences.cn: 他在仪式进行到一半时离开了。

sentences.en: The ceremony went off without a hitch.
